Articles.Content:
It makes me sad that an amazing game such as Kerbal Space Program is using royalty music. I think it should have it's own soundtrack. I'm willing to produce said soundtrack for free.

So just for fun I'm going to get the help of the forum, and with your input produce some quality tracks that are worthy of the game. Below is a list of tracks I have completed. Tell me what you think, and give me some input. If the thread catches enough momentum, maybe the developers will show some interest in using the tracks in the game

I've moved towards some melodic themes, but have tried to stick with the ambiance setting of the current soundtrack.

I can provide OGG, WAV, MP3, or FLAC files to the devs.

TRACKS:

Space Ambiance I : http://files.64digits.com/Sharkbyte/Kerbal%20Space%20I.mp3

Space Ambiance II : http://files.64digits.com/Sharkbyte/Kerbal%20Space%20II.mp3

Space Ambiance III: http://files.64digits.com/Sharkbyte/Kerbal%20Space%20III.mp3

Space Ambiance IV: http://files.64digits.com/Sharkbyte/Kerbal%20Space%20IV.mp3

Edited July 21, 2014 by Sneekit
Sounds great! I like it a lot.

It makes me kinda sad that an amazing game such as Kerbal Space program is using royalty music. I think it should have it's own soundtrack. I'm willing to produce said soundtrack for free.

I'd just like to point out that you say you feel Squad shouldn't use royalty-free music for the game, and your solution is to provide your own royalty-free music

It makes me kinda sad that an amazing game such as Kerbal Space program is using royalty music. I think it should have it's own soundtrack. I'm willing to produce said soundtrack for free.

So just for fun I'm going to get the help of the forum, and with your input produce some quality tracks that are worthy of the game. I'm going to post a little teaser snippit already so you can tell me what you think, and give me input. If the thread catches enough momentum, maybe the developers will show some interest in using the tracks in the game

Already this is a semi-new direction for the soundtrack. I'm moving away from some of the ambiance ad adding in some musical themes. Let me know what you think, any ideas you have, and any suggestions.

SAMPLES:

Space 1 - When you first enter orbit: http://files.64digits.com/Sharkbyte/Kerbal_Space_1.mp3

I for one WHOLLY support a direct community involvement in the music selection for KSP. Your included sample could share time with the current one, cycling through a playlist. I think that the music is one of the areas the devs will need to put some serious polish into once the core game is finished. I would like to see unique music for all bodies at some point.

Heres hoping Squad takes community submissions for the final product.

I'd just like to point out that you say you feel Squad shouldn't use royalty-free music for the game, and your solution is to provide your own royalty-free music

No, my music would ONLY be for use with KSP. Squad would own the copyright. I am writing these songs for the sole purpose of using them in KSP if they decide to do so.

Side note, I updated the Space-1 song. It is 2 minutes long, about the length of the current tracks.

No, my music would ONLY be for use with KSP. Squad would own the copyright. I am writing these songs for the sole purpose of using them in KSP if they decide to do so.

Oh, I know, I was just picking on you

But on topic, I'm growing a new appreciation for the existing in-game music. I played KSP with headphones for the first time last night (I've got 220+ hours logged without headphones) and was blown away by how different the music sounded once I could hear the lower register. Really digging it

Added a new track.

Space Ambiance II: http://files.64digits.com/Sharkbyte/Kerbal%20Space%20II.mp3
I really like this. Also, I sent you a personal message.
10/10 i would LOVE these to be in the stock game

Fourth ambiance track is complete! It is my personal favorite so far. I love it

http://files.64digits.com/Sharkbyte/Kerbal%20Space%20IV.mp3
Does anyone happen to recall or have the song SYRSA made for Kerbal Space Program before the YT account he hosted it on died? That was really cool.

Fourth ambiance track is complete! It is my personal favorite so far. I love it

http://files.64digits.com/Sharkbyte/Kerbal%20Space%20IV.mp3

Rep+

i feel this track is perfect for dres.
Wow, these are amazing. Could you put them into a .zip, and send it to me @[email protected], or put it up on Curse?
I love these, you should put these on curse!
